text: Anafoɔ ɛpono26.15 Anafoɔ pono. Dawid ne Salomo ahemfie no na ɛwɔ asɔredan no anafoɔ fam. Saa anafoɔ pono no mu na na ɔhene no fa. Saa ɔpono yi anohwɛ dwumadie no yɛ animuonyamhyɛdeɛ ma Obed Edom. (26.4-6; Hes 46.1-10) no, wɔde hyɛɛ Obed-Edom nsa, na wɔmaa ne mmammarima no hwɛɛ adekoradan no so.
